meanings: (필요한 것을) look[search] for, obtain, (formal) seek, (찾아내다) find (out), (얻다) get
(조언·양해·용서 등을) ask (for), request, (formal) seek, turn to (=청하다)
(위험에서) rescue[save] (sb from sth), (곤경에서) (formal) extricate (sb from sth)
have difficulty in finding a job

meanings.meaning: the battle to save the planet

vlive.korean: 에델바이스 되게 구하기 어려운 산 꼭대기에 있는... Edelweiss is the plant which grows on top of the mountains.. 듣기 View video SmileJ : [해외에서 난리난 연예인 스킨케어] 유튜버가 행사에 초대 받으면? 선물 받은 제품 언박싱
